infoSections.text: **Electroencephalography (EEG)** is a non-invasive method used to record the electrical activity of the brain. EEG measures voltage fluctuations resulting from ionic current flows within neurons in the brain.

tasks.taskDescription: Follow along on GitHub 3.1.2 Lesson and Practice [here] to better understand the components of EEG and practice signal processing. Submit a screenshot of your progress throughout the module.
